geticon: select name as icon,posttime as code from posted where posttime =(select min(posttime) from posted where posttime > ?);
delete: delete from posted where posttime < strftime('%Y%m%d%H%M%S')-180
deleteuser: delete from posted where posttime < strftime('%Y%m%d%H%M%S')-30
userinfo: select name,hash from user where name = ?
